issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: When using euca-register to register an EBS image one must supply a name for the image. If that doesn't happen, however, the CLC's response doesn't indicate what the problem actually was. {code} flounder (CLC WS CC0 SC0) ~ # euca-register --debug --snapshot snap-93E53CEB 2012-01-17 09:42:09,241 euca2ools DEBUG:Method: POST 2012-01-17 09:42:09,241 euca2ools DEBUG:Path: /services/Eucalyptus/ 2012-01-17 09:42:09,241 euca2ools DEBUG:Data: 2012-01-17 09:42:09,241 euca2ools DEBUG:Headers: {} 2012-01-17 09:42:09,241 euca2ools DEBUG:Host: flounder.eucalyptus:8773 2012-01-17 09:42:09,242 euca2ools DEBUG:establishing HTTP connection: kwargs={} 2012-01-17 09:42:09,242 euca2ools DEBUG:using _calc_signature_2 2012-01-17 09:42:09,243 euca2ools DEBUG:query string: AWSAccessKeyId=EPSKSEQPHKHQRPLW45SOW&Action=RegisterImage&BlockDeviceMapping.1.DeviceName=%2Fdev%2Fsda1&BlockDeviceMapping.1.Ebs.DeleteOnTermination=true&BlockDeviceMapping.1.Ebs.SnapshotId=snap-93E53CEB&RootDeviceName=%2Fdev%2Fsda1&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&Timestamp=2012-01-17T17%3A42%3A09Z&Version=2009-11-30 This transaction appears to have no content

Originally posted on 2012-03-15 22:06:31

Thu Mar 15 15:06:31 2012: Request 5697 was acted upon.
 Transaction: Given to grze by neil
       Queue: Engineering Bugs
     Subject: CLC's responses to EBS EMI RegisterImage requests that lack Names are useless
       Owner: grze
  Requestors: 
      Status: new
 Ticket <URL: https://support.eucalyptus.com/Ticket/Display.html?id=5697 >


This transaction appears to have no content

euca2ools require -n option but I could reproduce the issue with the empty name. 

 euca-register -n "" -a x86_64 -s snap-75553164 --debug

euca2ools.exceptions.AWSError: (500, 'Internal Server Error', 'InternalFailure', '\nExpected: not null\n     but: was null')

Fix Verified

Installed Packages
Name        : eucalyptus
Arch        : x86_64
Version     : 4.2.0
Release     : 0.0.24027.708.20151012gitd90b229.el6

{code}
[root@h-08 ~]# euca-register -n "" -a x86_64 -s snap-ffcb7a12
euca-register: error (InvalidAMIName.Malformed): AMI names must be between 3 and 128 characters long, and may contain letters, numbers, '(', ')', '.', '-', '/' and '_'
{code}
